name: Monster Truck Crash Derby 2021
description:
The time has come to introduce you to the latest free Monster Truck Racing Game of 2021 on App Store. Drive the Extreme Offroad Monster Truck in amazing Demolition Derby Arenas.

The Monster Truck has tremendous graphics which simulate the game in 4 different modes. Career Mode, Survival Mode, Free Mode and Coins Mode. Enjoy the amazing 4x4 fight with different monster trucks.

Features of Monster Truck Crash Demolition Derby 2021:
- Features amazing monster trucks
- Realistic Arenas.
- Easy Controls and the amazing physics adds more fun in the game. 
- 25+ Amazing Monster Trucks.
- A large variety of stunts ramp to perform Monster Truck Stunts.
- Smash and bang your enemies in mad derby fight of 2021.
- Daily Rewards.
- Enjoy the derby fight in Offroad arena and smash extreme GT monster derby battle Arena.
